## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Offshore pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system=60387, position -11.5, 23.5, status=EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT)
- PipeGroup (fluid system=60388, position -3.5, 24.5, status=EntityStatus.EMPTY)

### Lab at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (status=EntityStatus.NO_POWER)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to remove pipes
- Ensure the pipe exists at the specified position before attempting to remove it. 

### Errors when placing or connecting pipes
- Ensure that the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place or connect pipes.

### Errors related to boiler connections
- Verify that the boiler has the necessary input liquids and connections before attempting to connect it to other entities.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
